meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ultravirile.
meanings.sent1: His ultravirilities were evident in his strong physique and confident demeanor.
meanings.sent2: The ultravirilities of the lion were displayed in its powerful roar and majestic presence.
meanings.sent3: The ultravirilities of the superhero made the villains tremble in fear.
meanings.sent4: Her ultravirilities shone through like a beacon of strength in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The ultravirilities of the ancient warrior were legendary, inspiring awe in all who heard the tales.

meanings.definition: The ultravirile characteristics or qualities of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The artist's painting captured the ultravirilities of the sunset in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: In the wild, the ultravirilities of the cheetah are evident in its speed and agility.
meanings.sent3: The ultravirilities of the sports car made it the envy of all who saw it.
meanings.sent4: His ultravirilities in battle were unmatched, earning him the title of champion.
meanings.sent5: The ultravirilities of the mountain were breathtaking, towering over the landscape with grandeur.
